derivation: from H2224 (זָרַח) (in the sense of springing up);
outline:
1. a native (one rising from the soil)
    1. of man, native Israelites
    2. of tree, native (to Israel)
kjv_def: bay tree, (home-) born (in the land), of the (one's own) country (nation).
strongs_def: a spontaneous growth, i.e. native (tree or persons)
